code: import React from'react';import PlayerPosition from'./PlayerPosition';import'./Field.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Field=_ref=>{let{onPlayerClick,playerActions}=_ref;const players=[{id:'1',name:'Player 1',top:'20%',left:'40%'},{id:'2',name:'Player 2',top:'40%',left:'30%'},{id:'3',name:'Player 3',top:'40%',left:'50%'},{id:'4',name:'Goalkeeper',top:'80%',left:'45%'},{id:'5',name:'Goalkeeper 1',top:'85%',left:'55%'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:players.map(player=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerPosition,{player:player,onClick:()=>onPlayerClick(player.name),actions:playerActions[player.name]},player.id))});};export default Field;
